data.eml:eml: Capoeta anamisensis, a new species from the Minab and Hasan Langhi River drainages in Iran (Teleostei: Cyprinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Zareian, Halimeh, Esmaeili, Hamid Reza, Freyhof, Jörg (2016): Capoeta anamisensis, a new species from the Minab and Hasan Langhi River drainages in Iran (Teleostei: Cyprinidae). Zootaxa 4083 (1), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4083.1.7
